message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. Would you be willing to consider that price?

Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand you're looking for a better deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product for $11500. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll still get a lot of value from it. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $11000?

I understand you're still looking for a bit of a discount, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession and sell the product for $11250. It's the lowest I can go, but I think it's still a great deal for both of us. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $10500?

I understand you're really close to your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I get a good deal too. I'll sell the product to you for $10800. That's as low as I can go, and I think it's still a great value for you. What do you think?

I'm really close to my budget, and I think we're getting close to a deal. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $10800 and my original offer of $10000. Would you be willing to sell the product to me for $10400?
